pageContext.claim: “Chairman Kim realizes, perhaps better than anyone else, that without nuclear weapons, his country could fast become one of the great economic powers anywhere in the World. Because of its location and people (and him), it has more potential for rapid growth than any other nation!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump exaggerates North Korea's economic potential as he pushes for a denuclearization deal. Rapid growth could be possible, but without citing any studies or forecasts, his claim that it could grow faster than any other nation or become one of the top world economic powers is a real stretch.
